author: belforte
body:
as suggested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5841#issuecomment-632713671
@smuzaffar can you please do other changes to this spec file as you suggested ? I tried to do this for crab* spec files in COMP branch, but could not find the way, so I'd like to start from a working example.
title: test new CRAB tag naming scheme
